level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-315 added this section.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-315
level.text: Law 19-315, the "Child Sexual Abuse Reporting Amendment Act of 2012," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-647. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 15, 2012 and Dec. 4, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 22, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-627 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-315 became effective on June 8, 2013.
